entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , St. John's
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:45 PM NST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -1.1°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: St. John's Int'l Airport 01:16 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -1.1°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 99 %
Wind Chill: -10
Dewpoint: -1.3°C
Wind: NNE 52 km/h gust 74 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 2

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow at times heavy or ice pellets. Temperature steady near minus 1.
entry.summary: Ice pellets mixed with freezing rain and snow changing to snow at times heavy after midnight. Blowing snow. Snow and ice pellet amount 10 to 15 cm except 5 cm along the southern shore. Wind northeast 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast. Temperature steady near minus 1. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow and blowing snow. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow ending in the afternoon then clearing. Amount 5 cm. Wind north 60 km/h gusting to 80 except gusting to 100 along exposed areas of the coast in the morning. Wind becoming northwest 60 gusting to 80 near noon then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill near minus 11. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 20 in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries or rain showers. High plus 2. Forecast issued 12:14 AM NST Wednesday 15 February 2023
